text: I'm looking for the Michaelhouse Cafe.
The Michaelhouse Cafe is located at St. Michael's Church, Trinity Street in the city centre. It serves European cuisine and is in the expensive price range. You can try calling them at 01223 309147.

You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. Have a great time at the Michaelhouse Cafe, and I hope you enjoy your meal! Goodbye!
